00031 struct LUABIND_API function_object
00032 {
00033     function_object(lua_CFunction entry)
00034       : entry(entry)
00035       , next(0)
00036     {}
00037 
00038     virtual ~function_object()
00039     {}
00040 
00041     virtual int call(
00042         lua_State* L, invoke_context& ctx) const = 0;
00043     virtual void format_signature(lua_State* L, char const* function) const = 0;
00044 
00045     lua_CFunction entry;
00046     std::string name;
00047     function_object* next;
00048     object keepalive;
00049 };

00051 struct LUABIND_API invoke_context
00052 {
00053     invoke_context()
00054       : best_score((std::numeric_limits<int>::max)())
00055       , candidate_index(0)
00056     {}
00057 
00058     operator bool() const
00059     {
00060         return candidate_index == 1;
00061     }
00062 
00063     void format_error(lua_State* L, function_object const* overloads) const;
00064 
00065     int best_score;
00066     function_object const* candidates[10];
00067     int candidate_index;
00068 };

00070 template <class F, class Signature, class Policies, class IsVoid>
00071 inline int invoke0(
00072     lua_State* L, function_object const& self, invoke_context& ctx
00073   , F const& f, Signature, Policies const& policies, IsVoid, mpl::true_)
00074 {
00075     return invoke_member(
00076         L, self, ctx, f, Signature(), policies
00077       , mpl::long_<mpl::size<Signature>::value - 1>(), IsVoid()
00078     );
00079 }
00080 
00081 template <class F, class Signature, class Policies, class IsVoid>
00082 inline int invoke0(
00083     lua_State* L, function_object const& self, invoke_context& ctx,
00084     F const& f, Signature, Policies const& policies, IsVoid, mpl::false_)
00085 {
00086     return invoke_normal(
00087         L, self, ctx, f, Signature(), policies
00088       , mpl::long_<mpl::size<Signature>::value - 1>(), IsVoid()
00089     );
00090 }
00091 
00092 template <class F, class Signature, class Policies>
00093 inline int invoke(
00094     lua_State* L, function_object const& self, invoke_context& ctx
00095   , F const& f, Signature, Policies const& policies)
00096 {
00097     return invoke0(
00098         L, self, ctx, f, Signature(), policies
00099       , boost::is_void<typename mpl::front<Signature>::type>()
00100       , boost::is_member_function_pointer<F>()
00101    );
00102 }

00104 inline int maybe_yield_aux(lua_State*, int results, mpl::false_)
00105 {
00106     return results;
00107 }
00108 
00109 inline int maybe_yield_aux(lua_State* L, int results, mpl::true_)
00110 {
00111     return lua_yield(L, results);
00112 }
00113 
00114 template <class Policies>
00115 int maybe_yield(lua_State* L, int results, Policies*)
00116 {
00117     return maybe_yield_aux(
00118         L, results, mpl::bool_<has_yield<Policies>::value>());
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline int sum_scores(int const* first, int const* last)
00122 {
00123     int result = 0;
00124 
00125     for (; first != last; ++first)
00126     {
00127         if (*first < 0)
00128             return *first;
00129         result += *first;
00130     }
00131 
00132     return result;
00133 }

00135 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_NEXT_ITER(n) \
00136     typename mpl::next< \
00137         BOOST_PP_IF( \
00138             n, BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,BOOST_PP_DEC(n)), first) \
00139     >::type
00140 
00141 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_NEXT_INDEX(n) \
00142     BOOST_PP_IF( \
00143         n \
00144       , BOOST_PP_CAT(index,BOOST_PP_DEC(n)) + \
00145             BOOST_PP_CAT(c,BOOST_PP_DEC(n)).consumed_args() \
00146       , 1 \
00147     )
00148 
00149 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_COMPUTE_ARITY(n) + BOOST_PP_CAT(c,n).consumed_args()
00150 
00151 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_DECLARE_CONVERTER(n) \
00152     typedef LUABIND_INVOKE_NEXT_ITER(n) BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,n); \
00153     typedef typename mpl::deref<BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,n)>::type \
00154         BOOST_PP_CAT(a,n); \
00155     typedef typename find_conversion_policy<n + 1, Policies>::type \
00156         BOOST_PP_CAT(p,n); \
00157     typename mpl::apply_wrap2< \
00158         BOOST_PP_CAT(p,n), BOOST_PP_CAT(a,n), lua_to_cpp>::type BOOST_PP_CAT(c,n); \
00159     int const BOOST_PP_CAT(index,n) = LUABIND_INVOKE_NEXT_INDEX(n);
00160 
00161 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_COMPUTE_SCORE(n)                                   \
00162     , BOOST_PP_CAT(c,n).match(                                              \
00163         L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(BOOST_PP_CAT(a,n)), BOOST_PP_CAT(index,n))
00164 
00165 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_ARG(z, n, base) \
00166     BOOST_PP_CAT(c,base(n)).apply( \
00167         L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(BOOST_PP_CAT(a,base(n))), BOOST_PP_CAT(index,base(n)))
00168 
00169 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_CONVERTER_POSTCALL(n) \
00170     BOOST_PP_CAT(c,n).converter_postcall( \
00171         L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(BOOST_PP_CAT(a,n)), BOOST_PP_CAT(index,n));
00172 
00173 #  define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00174     (3, (0, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/call.hpp>))
00175 #  include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00176 
00177 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00178 #  define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00179     (3, (0, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/call.hpp>))
00180 #  include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00181 
00182 #  undef LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00183 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_MEMBER
00184 #  define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00185     (3, (0, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/call.hpp>))
00186 #  include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00187 
00188 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00189 #  define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00190     (3, (0, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/call.hpp>))
00191 #  include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00192 
00193 }} // namespace luabind::detail

00199 # ifdef LUABIND_INVOKE_MEMBER
00200 #  define N BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_PP_ITERATION())
00201 # else
00202 #  define N BOOST_PP_ITERATION()
00203 # endif

00205 template <class F, class Signature, class Policies>
00206 inline int
00207 # ifdef LUABIND_INVOKE_MEMBER
00208 invoke_member
00209 # else
00210 invoke_normal
00211 # endif
00212 (
00213     lua_State* L, function_object const& self, invoke_context& ctx
00214   , F const& f, Signature, Policies const&, mpl::long_<N>
00215 # ifdef LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00216   , mpl::true_
00217 # else
00218   , mpl::false_
00219 # endif
00220 )
00221 {
00222     typedef typename mpl::begin<Signature>::type first;
00223 # ifndef LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00224     typedef typename mpl::deref<first>::type result_type;
00225     typedef typename find_conversion_policy<0, Policies>::type result_policy;
00226     typename mpl::apply_wrap2<
00227         result_policy, result_type, cpp_to_lua>::type result_converter;
00228 # endif
00229 
00230 # if N > 0
00231 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) LUABIND_INVOKE_DECLARE_CONVERTER(n)
00232 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (0,N-1)
00233 #  include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00234 # endif
00235 
00236     int const arity = 0
00237 # if N > 0
00238 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) LUABIND_INVOKE_COMPUTE_ARITY(n)
00239 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (0,N-1)
00240 #  include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00241 # endif
00242     ;
00243 
00244     int const arguments = lua_gettop(L);
00245 
00246     int score = -1;
00247 
00248     if (arity == arguments)
00249     {
00250         int const scores[] = {
00251             0
00252 # if N > 0
00253 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) LUABIND_INVOKE_COMPUTE_SCORE(n)
00254 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (0,N-1)
00255 #  include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00256 # endif
00257         };
00258 
00259         score = sum_scores(scores + 1, scores + 1 + N);
00260     }
00261 
00262     if (score >= 0 && score < ctx.best_score)
00263     {
00264         ctx.best_score = score;
00265         ctx.candidates[0] = &self;
00266         ctx.candidate_index = 1;
00267     }
00268     else if (score == ctx.best_score)
00269     {
00270         ctx.candidates[ctx.candidate_index++] = &self;
00271     }
00272 
00273     int results = 0;
00274 
00275     if (self.next)
00276     {
00277         results = self.next->call(L, ctx);
00278     }
00279 
00280     if (score == ctx.best_score && ctx.candidate_index == 1)
00281     {
00282 # ifndef LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00283         result_converter.apply(
00284             L,
00285 # endif
00286 # ifdef LUABIND_INVOKE_MEMBER
00287             (c0.apply(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(a0), index0).*f)(
00288                 BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_DEC(N), LUABIND_INVOKE_ARG, BOOST_PP_INC)
00289             )
00290 # else
00291 #  define LUABIND_INVOKE_IDENTITY(x) x
00292             f(
00293                 BOOST_PP_ENUM(N, LUABIND_INVOKE_ARG, LUABIND_INVOKE_IDENTITY)
00294             )
00295 #  undef LUABIND_INVOKE_IDENTITY
00296 # endif
00297 # ifndef LUABIND_INVOKE_VOID
00298         )
00299 # endif
00300         ;
00301 
00302 # if N > 0
00303 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) LUABIND_INVOKE_CONVERTER_POSTCALL(n)
00304 #  define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (0,N-1)
00305 #  include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00306 # endif
00307 
00308         results = maybe_yield(L, lua_gettop(L) - arguments, (Policies*)0);
00309 
00310         int const indices[] = {
00311             arguments + results BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(N, index)
00312         };
00313 
00314         policy_list_postcall<Policies>::apply(L, indices);
00315     }
00316 
00317     return results;
00318 }
00319 
00320 # undef N
00321 
00322 #endif
